name: Kyubimon
effect: [When Digivolving] Reveal the top 3 cards of your deck. Add 1 Option card with [Plug-In] in its name among them to your hand. Place the remaining cards at the bottom of your deck in any order.
digivolve_effect: [Your Turn][Once Per Turn] When you use an Option card with a cost of 2 or more, 1 of your opponent's Digimon gets -2000 DP for the turn.
